pull.title: doc: Rewrite some validation docs as lock annotations
pull.body: #13402 added some lock annotations in comments. This pull removes them and adds clang-readable locking annotations instead.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13083 (Add compile time checking for cs_main runtime locking assertions by practicalswift)
* #11652 (Add missing locks: validation.cpp + related by practicalswift)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
